listitem.para: sample vector of values in the complex plane
elliptic filter values at sample points

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Function used for squared magnitude of an elliptic filter. Usually m1=eps*eps/(a*a-1). Returns v=real(ones(z)./(ones(z)+eps*eps*s.*s)) for s=%sn(z,m1).
